data.message: Please make it to where my friends can see my posts on their newsfeed again and vice versa. There are a lot of people that I'm friends with that I've sort of lost touch with over the years and because I don't talk to them that often, and it's like they have disappeared from my life forever because of how fb is now. I never see any of their posts anymore and I know they don't see mine either. I would rather see my friends then keep having to see stupid ads I don't even care about all the time.

replies.message: Hey Amanda. You can use “See First” to make sure you never miss a post from your friends or family. You won't receive a notification when your friends post. Learn how at: http://bit.ly/2ztzxFa. You can also find out more about News Feed sorting here: http://bit.ly/2itb9Zz. -Kiara
Facebook that only lets you select a few friends… I would like to select all of my friends
